import java.util.Iterator;

public class Duplicator<T> implements Iterator<T> {
    
    public final Iterator<T> iter;
    public final int n;
    
    private T item;
    private int k;
    
    public Duplicator<T> (Iterator<T> iter, int n) {
        this.iter = iter;
        this.n = n;
        k = 0;
    }
    
    public boolean hasNext() {
        return (iter.hasNext() || k != 0);
    }
    
    public T next() {
        if (hasNext()) {
            if (k == 0) {
                item = iter.next();
                k = n;
            }
            k--;
            return iter;
        }
    }
}
